contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Yamato |JapaneseName= 大和村 |settlement_type= Village |MapImage= Yamato in Kagoshima Prefecture.png |Region= [[Kyūshū]] ([[Ryukyu Islands|Ryukyu]]) |Prefecture= [[Kagoshima Prefecture|Kagoshima]] ([[Ōshima Subprefecture (Kagoshima)|Ōshima]]) |District=[[Ōshima District, Kagoshima|Ōshima]] |Area_km2= 88.15 |PopDate= August 1, 2011 |Population= 1,719 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 28 |LatitudeMinutes= 19 |LatitudeSeconds= 7 |LongtitudeDegrees= 129 |LongtitudeMinutes= 21 |LongtitudeSeconds= 27 |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Yamato Kagoshima.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.vill.yamato.lg.jp/ Village of Yamato] }} [[Image:Materiya waterfall Kagoshima JAPAN.jpg|thumb|Materiya waterfall]] {{nihongo|'''Yamato'''|大和村|Yamato-son}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located on [[Amami Ōshima]] in [[Kagoshima Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. The village belongs to the [[Ōshima District, Kagoshima|Ōshima District]]. ==Population== As of August 1, 2011, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 1,719 and the [[population density|density]] of 19.5 persons per km². The total area is 88.15 km². ==Establishment== The village was established in 1908. ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.vill.yamato.lg.jp/ Yamato official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Villages in Kagoshima Prefecture]] {{Kagoshima-geo-stub}}
